response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. My initial offer for the product is $1,200,000. I understand its worth to you is $800,000, and I aim to bridge this gap in a way that respects both our interests. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or negotiate the terms. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 1200000}
